mapper.insert: insert into big_tree_message (mid, user_id, ms_content, receiver_id, receiver_name, send_name) values(message_seq.nextval,#{user_id},#{ms_content},#{receiver_id} ,#{receiver_name},#{send_name})
mapper.select: select * from big_tree_message where receiver_id= #{receiver_id} order by mid desc
select * from big_tree_message where mid = #{mid} order by mid desc
select count(*) from big_tree_message where receiver_id= #{receiver_id}
select count(*) from big_tree_message where receiver_name= #{receiver_name} and ms_type = 0
